ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Maybe this song isn t resisted but has no effect bug affects more than just Pixie Strike... -- John H. Kim kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 11 Nov 1999, JasonF wrote:
>
> I tried to Chain/Fear Choon the other night at level 31. My Fear just
> didn't seem to be taking hold on this guy. It was like he was out of range
> (no resist message), but he was hitting me for 60s and 70s. I dutifully
> stood at his feet Screeching while he pummeled me trying to get it to take
> hold. Screech *finally* worked and he turned and fled. I had exactly 12
> HPs left at that point, so I decided chasing after him was probably a bad
> idea.

Maybe this "song isn't resisted but has no effect" bug affects
more than just Pixie Strike...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
